summary: This document outlines a project to support a U.S. contract agent (LIHUFF/1) operating in Mexico City, focusing on intelligence gathering and covert action related to right-wing political elements in Mexico. The project aims to provide insights into the stability of the Mexican government and potentially contribute to MHSPAWN objectives. It details the agent's background, objectives, operational assets, security considerations, and budget.
tags: U.S. Chamber of Commerce of Mexico City
Instituto de Investigaciones Sociales y Economicos
title: Project Outline: Support for Singleton Contract Agent Operating in Right-Wing Political Milieu in Mexico
